Export.zv: IRIS for UNIX (Ubuntu Server LTS for ARM64 Containers) 2021.1 (Build 205U)

XData.name: KPI
XData.Data: <kpi xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/deepsee/kpi" name="BI/DeepSee/AlertKPI " sourceType="manual" caption="AlertKPI" > <property name="hospitalID"/> <property name="HospitalName"/> <property name="context"/> <property name="type"/> <property name="createTime"/> <property name="sessionId"/> <property name="sourceConfigName"/> </kpi>

Method.name: %OnDashboardAction
OnCalculateMetrics
Method.Implementation:
do ##class(BI.Util.CreateData).insertData(2) &sql(SELECT COUNT(*) INTO :count FROM BI_TB.AlertMsg) set ..AlertCount = count &sql(DECLARE C1 CURSOR FOR SELECT count(*) as alertCount, a.hospitalID,b.HospitalName INTO :alertCount,:hospitalID,:HospitalName FROM BI_TB.AlertMsg a,BI_TB.HOSPITAL b where a.hospitalID=b.ID group by a.hospitalID) &sql(OPEN C1) &sql(FETCH C1) WHILE (SQLCODE = 0) { if ..%Instance=HospitalName{ set ..HospitalCount=alertCount $$$LOGINFO(..%Instance_" "_..AlertCount_""_..HospitalCount) } &sql(FETCH C1)} &sql(CLOSE C1)
Quit $$$OK

Method.name: OnGetInstances
Method.Implementation: Set pInstSet(1) = "Hospital-A" Set pInstSet(2) = "Hospital-B" Set pInstSet(3) = "Hospital-C" Set pInstSet(4) = "Hospital-D" Set pInstSet(5) = "Hospital-E" Set pInstSet(7) = "Hospital-F" Quit $$$OK

XData.name: ProductionDefinition
XData.Data: <Production Name="BI.PD.AlertProduction" LogGeneralTraceEvents="false"> <Description></Description> <ActorPoolSize>2</ActorPoolSize> <Item Name="BI.DeepSee.DashbordMetrics" Category="" ClassName="BI.DeepSee.DashbordMetrics" PoolSize="1" Enabled="true" Foreground="false" Comment="" LogTraceEvents="false" Schedule=""> <Setting Target="Adapter" Name="CallInterval">5</Setting> </Item> </Production>

Property.name: type
Property.Description: 错误级别 0告警，1错误，2严重 严重错误通知主管及研发

Property.name: sourceConfigName
Property.Description: 发送警报的业务主机的名称

Property.name: destination
Property.Description: 用于指定此警报消息的外部目标的字段

Property.name: WXID
Property.Description: 发送目标的微信ID，多个以英文的逗号分隔

Property.name: WJID
Property.Description: 发送目标的ID，多个以英文的逗号分隔

Property.name: DDID
Property.Description: 发送目标的钉钉ID，多个以英文的逗号分隔

Property.name: UserTelList
Property.Description: 发送目标的电话号码列表，多个以英文的逗号分隔

Property.name: UserEmailList
Property.Description: 发送目标的Email列表，多个以英文的逗号分隔

Method.name: insertData
Method.Implementation: ;insert into BI_TB.AlertMsg(DDID, UserEmailList, UserNameList, UserTelList, WJID, WXID, context, createTime, destination, hospitalID, sessionId, sourceConfigName, type) value() set i=count set tSC=$$$OK FOR { set i=i-1 q:i=0 set alertMsg=##class(BI.TB.AlertMsg).%New() set hospitalID=$RANDOM(7) set alertMsg.hospitalID=$Select(hospitalID'="0":hospitalID,hospitalID="0":"1") set alertMsg.context="错误 <Ens>ErrOutConnectExpired: 10.10.10.1: 的 TCP 连接超时期 (5) 已过" set alertMsg.createTime=##class(Ens.DataType.UTC).timeUTCtoLocal($ZDT($H,3)) set alertMsg.sessionId=$RANDOM(1000000) set tSC=alertMsg.%Save() w i,! } q tSC

XData.name: Style
XData.Data:
<style type="text/css">
.labelText {
	padding: 2px;
	background: white;
	color: darkblue;
	border: 1px solid black;
	height: 1.0em;
	width: 12.0em;
}

#table {
	border: 1px solid darkblue;
}
#title {
    color: #cbdbeb;
    font-family: "微软雅黑";
    background: #2a3f54;
}
.lookoutButton {
    font-weight: normal;
    font-family: "微软雅黑";
    border: none;
    background: #1abb9c;
}
 table.tpTable caption {
    border: none;
    background: #ccc;
    color: #fff;
}
table.tpTable th {
    border-right: none;
    border-bottom:none;
    background: #abbbca;
    color: #fff;
}
table.tpTable td {
    border-right: none;
}
.fieldSetDisabled {
    color: #101010;
    background: #eee;
}
.fieldSetDisabled legend {
    color: #101010;
    background: #eee;
    font-size: 20px;
}
.tpEven {
    color: darkblue;
    background: #c4e3f3;
}

</style>

XData.name: Contents
XData.Description: This XML defines the contents of this page.
XData.Data:
<page xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/zen" title="客户信息维护">
<hgroup> <vgroup valign="top"> <hgroup width="100%"> <tablePane id="table" caption="客户信息维护" tableName="BI_TB.HOSPITAL" useSnapshot="true"
showFilters="true" fixedHeaders="true" multiSelect="false" bodyHeight="15.0em" ondblclick="alert(zenThis.getProperty('selectedIndex'));" filtersDisabled="false" autoExecute="true"
showZebra="true" pageSize="10" showRowNumbers="true" valueColumn="ID" maxRows="10000" useKeys="true"
onupdate="zenPage.updatePagingInfo();"
> <parameter id="P1" value="B"/> <column colName="ID" hidden="true"/>
<column header="客户名称" colName="HospitalName" id="HospitalNameColumn" width="35%" filterType="text" /> <column header="等级" colName="Levels" id="Levels" width="35%" filterType="text" /> <column header="床位数" colName="BedCount" id="BedCount" width="35%" filterType="text" /> <column header="所在省份" colName="Address" id="Address" width="35%" filterType="text" /> <column header="备注" colName="Comment" width="30%" cellTitle="备注信息"/> <column header="操作" linkCaption="编辑" width="10%" onclick="zenPage.rowEdit()" link="#" cellTitle="编辑这条数据" /> <condition colName="Name" predicate="CONTAINS" value="K" rowStyle="background: #A0A0F0;"/> <condition colName="Active" predicate="EQ" value="1" rowStyle="font-weight: bold;"/> </tablePane> </hgroup> <tableNavigator tablePaneId="table"/> <spacer height="5"/> </vgroup> </hgroup>
</page>

XData.name: Style
XData.Data:
<style type="text/css">
.labelText {
	padding: 2px;
	background: white;
	color: darkblue;
	border: 1px solid black;
	height: 1.0em;
	width: 12.0em;
}

#table {
	border: 1px solid darkblue;
}
 table.tpTable caption {
    border: none;
    background: #ccc;
    color: #fff;
}
table.tpTable th {
    border-right: none;
    border-bottom:none;
    background: #abbbca;
    color: #fff;
}
table.tpTable td {
    border-right: none;
    font-weight: normal;
    font-size:12px;
    font-family: "微软雅黑";
}
.fieldSetDisabled {
    color: #101010;
    background: #eee;
}
.fieldSetDisabled legend {
    color: #101010;
    background: #eee;
    font-size: 20px;
}
.tpEven {
    color: darkblue;
    background: #c4e3f3;
}

</style>

XData.name: Contents
XData.Description: This XML defines the contents of this page.
XData.Data:
<page xmlns="http://www.intersystems.com/zen" title="tablePane Test Page"> <vgroup> <spacer height="5"/> <hgroup width="100%"> <tablePane id="table" caption="消息展示" tableName="BI_TB.AlertMsg" useSnapshot="true"
showFilters="true" fixedHeaders="true" bodyHeight="20.0em" ondblclick="alert(zenThis.getProperty('selectedIndex'));" filtersDisabled="false" autoExecute="true" multiSelect="false" showZebra="true" pageSize="30" showRowNumbers="true" valueColumn="ID" maxRows="10000" useKeys="true"
onupdate="zenPage.updatePagingInfo();" onselectrow="zenPage.rowSelected(zenThis);" onunselectrow="zenPage.rowUnselected(zenThis);"
> <parameter id="P1" value="B"/> <column colName="ID" hidden="true"/> <column header="事件时间" colName="createTime" width="10%" filterType="text" /> <column header="医院名称" colName="hospitalID" width="15%" filterType="text" filterOp="%STARTSWITH" /> <column header="告警组件" colName="sourceConfigName" width="10%" /> <column header="告警内容" colName="context" width="40%" title="true"/> <column header="会话ID" colName="sessionId" width="8%" cellTitle="备注信息" /> <column header="接收人" colName="UserNameList" width="10%" filterType="text" filterOp="["/>
<!--> <column header="钉钉ID" colName="DDID" width="20%" filterType="text" filterOp="%STARTSWITH" /> <column header="微信ID" colName="WXID" id="wxColumn" width="20%" filterType="text" filterOp="%STARTSWITH"/> <column header="电话号码" colName="UserTelList" width="10%" filterType="text" /> <column header="Email" colName="UserEmailList" width="10%" filterType="text" /> <--> <condition colName="Name" predicate="CONTAINS" value="K" rowStyle="background: #A0A0F0;"/> <condition colName="Active" predicate="EQ" value="1" rowStyle="font-weight: bold;"/> </tablePane> </hgroup> <tableNavigator tablePaneId="table"/> <spacer height="5"/> </vgroup> <spacer width="25"/> </page>

Method.name: CreateRS
Method.Description: Create the result set used by the table pane. <var>pInfo</var> holds details on how to create the query.

Method.name: setTitleFilter
Method.Description: User click on custom title filter

Method.name: restoreFilters
Method.Description: Restore saved set of filter values.

Method.name: rowUnselected
Method.Description: User unselected the current row in the table

Method.name: %OnDrawHTMLBody
Method.Description:
This callback is called at the start of the HTML BODY section of the page.
(default implementation is a simple expression).
